A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This might be the worst Star Wars movie... which is really sad becuase I liked the last two alot and had hopes Disney would keep the streak going.  Why?  Becasue of... buffoon Hux... cheesy Space Balls Poe lines... Princes Leia floating... Force Skype... and most notably would be the complete waste of Snoke as a character.  What did I like?  There were a few cool ship battles and BB8 seemed to be well incorporated.  I think this will be a well received movie by the non-Star Wars public\, but fans are going to hate it.  Who's the primary villain in this movie... There wasn't one!
